IPC¶

class IPC.IPC¶

Responsible for reading/writing from/to client.

read_curr_lane()¶

Reads current lane the car is in. :return: current lane

read_img()¶

Receive Image :return: Image as byte string

read_pc_img()¶

Receive Point Cloud Image :return: Image as byte string

read_speed()¶

Read speed of the car :return: speed
